source: Oh, yeah. Come to poppa!
translation: Oh, yeah. Come to poppa!

source: Raz, what have you done? This is not control! This is chaos!
translation: Raz, what have you done? This is not control! This is chaos!

source: I'll try to fix it. You stay here and keep their numbers under control.
translation: I'll try to fix it. You stay here and keep their numbers under control.

source: This is a censor.
translation: This is a censor.

source: Welcome to my mind.
translation: Welcome to my mind.

source: Huh. It's so empty.
translation: Huh. It's so empty.

source: Uh, I mean--
translation: Uh, I mean--

source: There's more here than meets the eye, but I've learned to keep it under strict control.
translation: There's more here than meets the eye, but I've learned to keep it under strict control.

source: And that's what I'm going to teach you: control.
translation: And that's what I'm going to teach you: control.

source: Your feelings, your fears, your anger. You must learn to control them, focus them, concentrate them, and release them.
translation: Your feelings, your fears, your anger. You must learn to control them, focus them, concentrate them, and release them.

source: As therapy?
translation: As therapy?

source: No, as firepower!
translation: No, as firepower!

source: Say something hideous and horrible jumps out at you. Something so disgusting that it simply must die.
translation: Say something hideous and horrible jumps out at you. Something so disgusting that it simply must die.

source: Ahhh, oh, so tacky... I can't... look... directly at it!
translation: Ahhh, oh, so tacky... I can't... look... directly at it!

source: But I control those feelings, focus them, concentrate, and
translation: But I control those feelings, focus them, concentrate, and

source: release!
translation: release!

source: And the world is a better place.
translation: And the world is a better place.

source: Your turn.
translation: Your turn.

source: Okay...
translation: Okay...

source: Hggfgg!  Gahhh!
translation: Hggfgg!  Gahhh!

source: Excellent. A victory for good taste.
translation: Excellent. A victory for good taste.

source: Now, you must strive for precision when targeting. Say you were set upon by multiple attackers.
translation: Now, you must strive for precision when targeting. Say you were set upon by multiple attackers.

source: Eh.
translation: Eh.

source: Yecch.
translation: Yecch.

source: Bleh.
translation: Bleh.

source: But you need to dispense with them in a certain order. Eliminate these monsters in the proper sequence and we can move on to the next lesson.
translation: But you need to dispense with them in a certain order. Eliminate these monsters in the proper sequence and we can move on to the next lesson.

source: Young man, I hope you've learned a lesson here today.
translation: Young man, I hope you've learned a lesson here today.

source: Yes I have.
translation: Yes I have.

source: That shooting things is fun and useful.
translation: That shooting things is fun and useful.

source: No, that once you lose control of your own mind, it's very hard to get it back!
translation: No, that once you lose control of your own mind, it's very hard to get it back!

source: Yes. One's thoughts must be 100% controlled at all times!
translation: Yes. One's thoughts must be 100% controlled at all times!

source: Well, no. Actually, if you try to completely suppress your undesirable feelings, they'll build and build and eventually explode.
translation: Well, no. Actually, if you try to completely suppress your undesirable feelings, they'll build and build and eventually explode.

source: Oh. So, uh, what would happen if you were to, say, completely block off all your censor outlets?
translation: Oh. So, uh, what would happen if you were to, say, completely block off all your censor outlets?

source: Well, there would be a buildup of censor energy within, that would... uh eventually
translation: Well, there would be a buildup of censor energy within, that would... uh eventually

source: Run, Razputin. Very fast.
translation: Run, Razputin. Very fast.

source: You are my own creation. I command you to stop!
translation: You are my own creation. I command you to stop!

source: Ahhhhhhh!
translation: Ahhhhhhh!

source: Razputin, it's time to earn your merit badge!
translation: Razputin, it's time to earn your merit badge!

source: Again.
translation: Again.

source: Come now. Focus.
translation: Come now. Focus.

source: Shoot!
translation: Shoot!

source: Repeat.
translation: Repeat.

source: What are you waiting for?
translation: What are you waiting for?

source: Let's get moving.
translation: Let's get moving.

source: Excellent.
translation: Excellent.

source: Control.
translation: Control.

source: Focus.
translation: Focus.

source: Concentrate.
translation: Concentrate.

source: Release.
translation: Release.

source: Try it again.
translation: Try it again.

source: Ahhhhh!
translation: Ahhhhh!

source: Ach!
translation: Ach!

source: Ai-ai-ai-ai-ai!
translation: Ai-ai-ai-ai-ai!

source: Razputin!
translation: Razputin!

source: Oooh-ooh-oooh...
translation: Oooh-ooh-oooh...

source: Peel me off and put me down!
translation: Peel me off and put me down!

source: Enough!
translation: Enough!

source: Oof!
translation: Oof!

source: Uggg!
translation: Uggg!

source: Ow!
translation: Ow!

source: Gahhhh!
translation: Gahhhh!

source: No, Raz, shoot them in order. Let's try this again.
translation: No, Raz, shoot them in order. Let's try this again.

source: This is controlled by that dial over there.
translation: This is controlled by that dial over there.

source: This is going to take forever. I wonder if I can speed it up somehow.
translation: This is going to take forever. I wonder if I can speed it up somehow.

source: I wonder what would happen if I turned that dial up.
translation: I wonder what would happen if I turned that dial up.

source: So, is this where I get a speech and learn another lesson?
translation: So, is this where I get a speech and learn another lesson?

source: No. Here's your merit badge. Let us never speak of this again.
translation: No. Here's your merit badge. Let us never speak of this again.

source: Now then...
translation: Now then...

source: Is this what you saw in your vision?
translation: Is this what you saw in your vision?

source: An integral part of any sane person's mind.
translation: An integral part of any sane person's mind.

source: The censors roam through your psyche, looking for thoughts that don't belong.
translation: The censors roam through your psyche, looking for thoughts that don't belong.

source: Hallucinations, manias, waking dreams--the censors hunt them down and censor them out.
translation: Hallucinations, manias, waking dreams--the censors hunt them down and censor them out.

source: Why do they come after me? I'm not a mania!
translation: Why do they come after me? I'm not a mania!

source: Yes, but you are a foreign entity in my mind. You technically don't belong here.
translation: Yes, but you are a foreign entity in my mind. You technically don't belong here.

source: Yes. Well, the Brain Tumbler could be malfunctioning. Or you could be insane.
translation: Yes. Well, the Brain Tumbler could be malfunctioning. Or you could be insane.

source: We'll test for that later. For now...
translation: We'll test for that later. For now...

source: So, what do I do?
translation: So, what do I do?

source: Blast it!
translation: Blast it!

source: That's the spirit.
translation: That's the spirit.

source: I killed it.
translation: I killed it.

source: It was just a thought I was having. And it's not dead. It has just returned to its basic form--raw psychic energy. Go absorb it. It's good for your mental health.
translation: It was just a thought I was having. And it's not dead. It has just returned to its basic form--raw psychic energy. Go absorb it. It's good for your mental health.

source: Now I'll leave the machine on for you, so you can practice. You have to blast 1000 censors to earn your Marksmanship Merit Badge.
translation: Now I'll leave the machine on for you, so you can practice. You have to blast 1000 censors to earn your Marksmanship Merit Badge.

source: Come back every day for practice, and you should have enough in as little as three weeks!
translation: Come back every day for practice, and you should have enough in as little as three weeks!

source: Three weeks! I only have a few days to earn ALL my merit badges and become a Psychonaut.
translation: Three weeks! I only have a few days to earn ALL my merit badges and become a Psychonaut.

source: Slow and steady wins the race, my eager young friend. Now practice. Slowly and carefully.
translation: Slow and steady wins the race, my eager young friend. Now practice. Slowly and carefully.

source: Oh man...
translation: Oh man...

source: I need to stop whatever's shooting out these censors!
translation: I need to stop whatever's shooting out these censors!

source: Those little censors are re-energizing the big one somehow.
translation: Those little censors are re-energizing the big one somehow.

source: This should stop any more censors from coming out of here.
translation: This should stop any more censors from coming out of here.

source: Destroy them all!
translation: Destroy them all!

source: Well done, Raz. Keep shooting!
translation: Well done, Raz. Keep shooting!

source: Good. Again!
translation: Good. Again!

source: Razputin! You must blast the emergency shut-down valves!
translation: Razputin! You must blast the emergency shut-down valves!

source: It's the only way to close off the leak!
translation: It's the only way to close off the leak!

source: Shut down all the valves on this face to get it under control!
translation: Shut down all the valves on this face to get it under control!

source: Hurry, Razputin!
translation: Hurry, Razputin!

source: Yes, yes. We all know you can punch things.
translation: Yes, yes. We all know you can punch things.

source: But you're supposed to be learning how to use your PSI Blast now.
translation: But you're supposed to be learning how to use your PSI Blast now.

source: Try it without punching.
translation: Try it without punching.

source: That's it! I've completely blocked off all of Sasha's censor outlets!  I can't wait to tell him.
translation: That's it! I've completely blocked off all of Sasha's censor outlets!  I can't wait to tell him.

source: Enough horseplay, Razputin! Destroy him!
translation: Enough horseplay, Razputin! Destroy him!

source: The small censors are feeding into his strength. You must stop them!
translation: The small censors are feeding into his strength. You must stop them!

source: Destroy the valves that are emitting the small censors, Razputin!
translation: Destroy the valves that are emitting the small censors, Razputin!

source: Raz! Shoot the valves! It's no use shooting the monster until you've destroyed every valve!
translation: Raz! Shoot the valves! It's no use shooting the monster until you've destroyed every valve!

source: Don't forget to use your mental focus to lock on the valves as a target, and then blast them!
translation: Don't forget to use your mental focus to lock on the valves as a target, and then blast them!

source: Use /LeftFlipper/ to lock mental focus.
translation: Use /LeftFlipper/ to lock mental focus.

source: Say, Razputin. Do you think you could reach in my pocket and hand me my cigarettes?
translation: Say, Razputin. Do you think you could reach in my pocket and hand me my cigarettes?

source: Excellent! You've shut down the valves so he cannot be rejuvenated. Now destroy him!
translation: Excellent! You've shut down the valves so he cannot be rejuvenated. Now destroy him!

source: Use your mental focus Razputin! It will help you shoot accurately, and also help you with your evasive maneuvers!
translation: Use your mental focus Razputin! It will help you shoot accurately, and also help you with your evasive maneuvers!

source: When focused, you can tumble to the side, avoid his stamp, and circle around behind the monster!
translation: When focused, you can tumble to the side, avoid his stamp, and circle around behind the monster!

source: Watch out for those tumbling boils he's throwing at you. They're full of censors!
translation: Watch out for those tumbling boils he's throwing at you. They're full of censors!

source: You can kill many small censors in one blow, if you jump up in the air above them and then smash the ground with your psychic fist.
translation: You can kill many small censors in one blow, if you jump up in the air above them and then smash the ground with your psychic fist.

source: Press /XButton/ while airborne to execute a Palm Bomb.
translation: Press /XButton/ while airborne to execute a Palm Bomb.

source: Oh, you. What a pleasant surprise.
translation: Oh, you. What a pleasant surprise.

source: Enough, Razputin! The beast must die, now!
translation: Enough, Razputin! The beast must die, now!

source: If you are mentally focused, and executing a sideways tumble, it will be very hard for him to stamp you.
translation: If you are mentally focused, and executing a sideways tumble, it will be very hard for him to stamp you.

source: Razputin, if you could finish this off soon, I might get out of it with only a mild concussion.
translation: Razputin, if you could finish this off soon, I might get out of it with only a mild concussion.

source: What? Who's there? I think I've lost my vision!
translation: What? Who's there? I think I've lost my vision!

source: Why no, Aunt Bernie, of course I didn't get your phone calls or else I would have responded right away.
translation: Why no, Aunt Bernie, of course I didn't get your phone calls or else I would have responded right away.

source: My name is Yan Yanssen, I live in Wisconsin, I work in the lumber yard there...
translation: My name is Yan Yanssen, I live in Wisconsin, I work in the lumber yard there...

source: La di da... do do da dum...
translation: La di da... do do da dum...

source: Wow. Okay, that last hit brought me back. Where was I?
translation: Wow. Okay, that last hit brought me back. Where was I?

source: Um, well, it sure seemed a lot bigger in my head.
translation: Um, well, it sure seemed a lot bigger in my head.

source: Ah, problems often seem larger in our heads than they really are. That's an important lesson to learn.
translation: Ah, problems often seem larger in our heads than they really are. That's an important lesson to learn.

source: But--
translation: But--

source: Yes, but I was attacked in my own head.
translation: Yes, but I was attacked in my own head.

source: Um... Well...
translation: Um... Well...

source: The machine is having a little trouble. I'm looking into it. Meanwhile...
translation: The machine is having a little trouble. I'm looking into it. Meanwhile...

source: As you absorb this energy, your mental health increases.
translation: As you absorb this energy, your mental health increases.

source: But as you PSI Blast, you expend your will to do damage.
translation: But as you PSI Blast, you expend your will to do damage.

source: So be on the look out for these small, dense clusters of raw psychic aggression.
translation: So be on the look out for these small, dense clusters of raw psychic aggression.

source: Absorb these as well to make sure you always have enough firepower.
translation: Absorb these as well to make sure you always have enough firepower.

source: Hm. They're coming out faster but still not fast enough.
translation: Hm. They're coming out faster but still not fast enough.

source: Hm. Still not fast enough!
translation: Hm. Still not fast enough!

source: Uh oh.
translation: Uh oh.

source: Good shooting, Raz, but you are making it harder than it needs to be.
translation: Good shooting, Raz, but you are making it harder than it needs to be.

source: You need to practice locking your mental focus.
translation: You need to practice locking your mental focus.

source: It makes targeting and evasive maneuvers much easier.
translation: It makes targeting and evasive maneuvers much easier.

source: Let's try again, this time lock your mental focus.
translation: Let's try again, this time lock your mental focus.

source: Razputin, see those valves? That is where the censors are leaking out.
translation: Razputin, see those valves? That is where the censors are leaking out.

source: PSI Blast the valves to shut them down and get this area under control!
translation: PSI Blast the valves to shut them down and get this area under control!

source: Good, now the next one. You have to get them all.
translation: Good, now the next one. You have to get them all.

source: Good, well you got them all.
translation: Good, well you got them all.

source: Oh, no. You close one leak down and another springs up!
translation: Oh, no. You close one leak down and another springs up!

source: Well come on. We've got to take care of these too!
translation: Well come on. We've got to take care of these too!

source: Oh, no. What are you doing back in here?
translation: Oh, no. What are you doing back in here?

source: Practicing.
translation: Practicing.

source: Oh, would you like to run the course again?
translation: Oh, would you like to run the course again?

source: Yeah, I--run the course? But all that censor overload stuff... that was an accident.
translation: Yeah, I--run the course? But all that censor overload stuff... that was an accident.

source: Oh, Raz. I knew you were going to overload that switch. I would have done the same thing at your age.
translation: Oh, Raz. I knew you were going to overload that switch. I would have done the same thing at your age.

source: It was all arranged to make you an expert fighter. And it worked.
translation: It was all arranged to make you an expert fighter. And it worked.

source: Now, if you'd like to run the course again, just shoot the controller on any given face.
translation: Now, if you'd like to run the course again, just shoot the controller on any given face.

source: To close that face up and open another, shoot any censor valves you see.
translation: To close that face up and open another, shoot any censor valves you see.

source: Fair enough?
translation: Fair enough?

source: Even the part where the giant censor had you on the stamp?
translation: Even the part where the giant censor had you on the stamp?

source: Okay, that part got a little out of hand. We won't be seeing him again.
translation: Okay, that part got a little out of hand. We won't be seeing him again.

source: Razputin! I'm so glad to see you. What's happened?
translation: Razputin! I'm so glad to see you. What's happened?

source: Coach Oleander is trying to take over the world with a fleet of psychic death tanks, armed with the stolen brains of my fellow campers.
translation: Coach Oleander is trying to take over the world with a fleet of psychic death tanks, armed with the stolen brains of my fellow campers.

source: Where are you?
translation: Where are you?

source: I... I have no idea. I seem to be... asleep... or in a trance...
translation: I... I have no idea. I seem to be... asleep... or in a trance...

source: Well don't worry about it. Ford and I are on the case.
translation: Well don't worry about it. Ford and I are on the case.

source: Okay. I'd love to join you, but I think I need to focus on maintaining some level of brain activity.
translation: Okay. I'd love to join you, but I think I need to focus on maintaining some level of brain activity.

source: Ooh, I can help with that! Let me shoot up the place!
translation: Ooh, I can help with that! Let me shoot up the place!

source: Move RIGHT /Joystick/ while holding /LeftFlipper/ to switch targets.
translation: Move RIGHT /Joystick/ while holding /LeftFlipper/ to switch targets.

source: Press /RightFlipper/ to shoot.
translation: Press /RightFlipper/ to shoot.

source: Hold /LeftFlipper/ to lock on to a target.
translation: Hold /LeftFlipper/ to lock on to a target.

source: Hold /LeftFlipper/ to lock on, then press /RightFlipper/
translation: Hold /LeftFlipper/ to lock on, then press /RightFlipper/

source: When your MENTAL FOCUS is LOCKED, press /AButton/ and move the LEFT /Joystick/ to execute a fast tumble in any direction. Very useful for circling your enemies!
translation: When your MENTAL FOCUS is LOCKED, press /AButton/ and move the LEFT /Joystick/ to execute a fast tumble in any direction. Very useful for circling your enemies!

source: DAILY MAXIMUM REACHED for this Censor output setting. Please increase Censor output setting if more Censors are desired.
translation: DAILY MAXIMUM REACHED for this Censor output setting. Please increase Censor output setting if more Censors are desired.

source: Enough horseplay, Razputin!
translation: Enough horseplay, Razputin!

source: Razputin, instead of that why don't you help me free Ms. Zanotto?
translation: Razputin, instead of that why don't you help me free Ms. Zanotto?
